message.body: It's 6 walks total. ######### Wed lunch, dinner and sleepover. Thurs bkfast, lunch and dinner. They return Thurs night at 9pm. She'll need to get her am/pm pills too. 1 pill in the am. 1 1/2 in the pm.
If you need Michelle to help, just let me know.
Ok sounds good. Will she have her leash on like last time?

I'm not sure. I think you'll be fine, though. I forgot to ask Arnie... I'll call him again and find out. If not, Michelle can help. Are you able to do all the walks or do you need her to do a lunch walk?
Maybe she can do that Wed lunch and leash her for you.
If Michelle can do the wends lunch and leash her that would be great, if not I don't think it will be too big of a problem.
Ok, I'll let you know. She should be able to do it. Are you able to do the other walks?
Yes I am. Thanks for the work!
Thank YOU! I probably won't see you before I head down to FL. Have a great Thanksgiving. Call if you need anything.
Ok will do have a great time in the sunshine state. I hope it's significantly warmer there for you.
